mapper.select: SELECT auth_id, user_num, user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_email, user_address FROM tb_user ORDER BY user_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( user_id, user_passwd, user_name, user_email, user_address, auth_id ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPasswd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, 3)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_id = #{userId}, user_passwd = #{userPasswd}, user_name = #{userName}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_address = #{userAddress}, auth_id = #{authId} WHERE user_num = #{userNum}
